items.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.

Base duration is 5.00 seconds
Pulses every 0.40 seconds
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
5% increased Area of Effect
